member.name: M:HRCoreCountriesWebAPI2.Controllers.HRBordersController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Method to get a specific HRBorder by its FIPS

member.name: M:HRCoreCountriesWebAPI2.Controllers.HRBordersController.Get(HRCommonModel.PagingParameterInModel,HRCommonModels.HRSortingParamModel)
member.summary: Method to get a list of ordered HRBorders. Server limit page size is 50 items. Beyond this value a http Status 416 : Requested Range Not Satisfiable is returned.
member.param: The PagingInParameter. Can be null (will be set to server Default)
The ordering param. Retrun a status 400 bad request is underlying services don't know how to order. Can be null. Sample : "FIPS;ASC;ISO2;DESC"
member.returns: The HRBorders corresponding to pageModel parameter. Can throw MemberAccessException if any service is not consistant.

member.name: M:HRCoreCountriesWebAPI2.Controllers.HRBordersController.GetDefaultPagingInParameter
member.summary: Set and return the Default PagingParameter for all the class. Does not throw any Exception.

member.name: M:HRCoreCountriesWebAPI2.Controllers.HRCountriesController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get by ID Rest Method based on GetFromID(String id) method

member.name: M:HRCoreCountriesWebAPI2.Controllers.HRCountriesController.Get(HRCommonModel.PagingParameterInModel,HRCommonModels.HRSortingParamModel)
member.summary: Get by PagingInParameter based on GetFromPaging method
member.param: If pageModel is null return the first page else the querried one.
member.returns: The expected PagingParameterOutModel or a null result with the http status code.

member.name: M:HRCoreCountriesWebAPI2.Controllers.HRCountriesController.GetDefaultPagingInParameter
member.summary: Create the default Paging without throwing any Exception.
